channel.title: Connor Baker | Software Engineer
channel.description: Recent content on Connor Baker | Software Engineer

item.title: Hello!
item.description: I’m Connor, software engineer and lifelong learner. As a relative latecomer to the world of development, I enjoy learning more about how the tools we use everyday work “under the hood”, as well as just about anything that makes coding fun. I studied music at a conservatory before attending a bootcamp years later. After getting my first engineering job, I took a couple of excellent courses at the Bradfield School of Computer Science.
